overview.en: CarLive Chain is a vertical application of blockchain technology in the field of vehicle networking. It provides services to 1.3 billion vehicle users worldwide and the trillion-dollar-scale automobile consumer market.
overview.zh: CarLive Chain是区块链技术在车联网领域的垂直应用，CarLive Chain致力于建立一条汽车消费领域的区块链价值公链。面向全球13亿辆汽车的用户群体和万亿美元级规模汽车消费市场提供服务，为用户带来全新、快乐的车生活体验。
